name: Paper Wizards
description:
This game is difficult and challenging fast-paced action with ability to tailor your approach and construct your skills to match your own style, rely on your agility, destructive power or quick decision making skills to overcome all the challenges the game can throw at you.

Features Include

  • ability crafting system, allowing for hundreds of combinations
  • challenging gameplay and difficult encounters
  • 3 Levels
  • 11 unique enemies with their own AI behavior and mechanics
